TopicTitle: Issue Resolved: Map screen automatically zooms out.

Articles.Content:
RESOLVED: I uninstalled and reinstalled the game and that fixed the issue. I've been playing for about 3 hours now and the glitch hasn't reoccured.

 

Whenever I open the map screen in flight, it automatically zooms out without me touching any buttons. Is there any way to fix this? I'd really like to get into this game but there's  so many bugs and technical issues that it's nearly unplayable.

 

I'm using:

CONSOLE: Xbox One S, 2tb hard drive installed.

EDITION: KSP Enhanced Edition (no dlc)

 

Edited December 14, 2021 by Steave118
I have found a way to resolve the issue.

Have you tried a different controller to verify it’s a game bug? Are you repeatedly switching between the craft and map view when it happens?  Can you make it happen repeatedly in the same way? Like shut the game down and restart it and make it happen again.? After I’ve been playing on my Xbox 1 x for a bit and depending on what all I’ve been doing, the processor can start to act like it’s getting bogged down ….  Are you only dealing with one vehicle at a time ? Jumping from multiple ships back and forth?

4 hours ago, Steave118 said:

Whenever I open the map screen in flight, it automatically zooms out without me touching any buttons.

That was intentionally coded, it's really annoying but you have to work with it.

I'm in my first career save with one single basic rocket. I've tried switching controllers, restarting the game, using a keyboard + mouse, quitting and reopening the game, and restarting the Xbox. There seems to be nothing I can do. Is there a way for me to get a refund? The game simply does not work like it's supposed to.
